property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab." - Joseph Conrad, *The Mirror of the Sea*

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap two target lands. −1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −4: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sliver creatures you control have double strike. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their appendages are sharper than our swords and quicker than our bows." - Hastric, Thunian scout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Early Jamuraan hunters devised a weapon that would return to its source. Tolarian Æthermancers developed a spell that skipped the weapon entirely.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [+1]: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control. −7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total. When Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ogres are driven by passion, rage, and another ogre standing behind them with a whip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play with the top card of your library revealed. As long as the top card of your library is black, Vampire Nocturnus and other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+1 and have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life will set with the sun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the sea came all life, and to the sea it will return. The sooner the better." - Emperor Aboshan

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: According to merfolk legend, a denizen of the deep swallows the horizon at the end of each day, bringing on the cold blanket of night.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some wizards compete not to summon the most interesting creatures, but to create the most interesting aftereffects when a summons goes awry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once I supply the breeze, you'll see your warriors for the smoke they truly are." - Alexi, zephyr mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?" - Jace Beleren

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other birds collect twigs for their nests. Magpies collect jewels for theirs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages routinely summon creatures from the Æther. It's only fair that they occasionally throw one back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To gaze under its hood is to invite death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Other black creatures get +1/+1. Nonblack creatures get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His soul snared by an angel's curse, Crovax twisted heroism into its purest shadow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Crowd of Cinders's power and toughness are each equal to the number of black permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They envy the life-giving heat so much that they tear it from those who still possess it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off." - Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imps are just intelligent enough to have an understanding of cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Essence Drain deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elves are right: Death inevitably leads to life. But the truly powerful don't just experience this cycle. They control it." - Crovax, ascendant evincar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those without beauty are Lorwyn's greatest tumor. The winnowers have an unpleasant duty, but a necessary one." - Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a vicious circle. Stress breeds pain. Pain breeds stress. It's simply beautiful, wouldn't you agree?" - Vradeen, vampire nocturnus

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The beauty of mental attacks is that your victims never remember them." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Winnowers live to eliminate eyeblights, creatures the elves deem too ugly to exist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mortivore's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {B}: Regenerate Mortivore.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing is sacred to rats. Everything is simply another meal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one in Aphetto answers a knock at the door after sundown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan." - Rabindranath Tagore

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart." - Codex of the Constellari

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." - Sarkhan Vol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For Sarkhan Vol, the dragon is the purest expression of life's savage splendor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Boggarts divide the world into two categories: things you can eat, and things you have to chase down and pummel before you can eat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Cinder Pyromancer deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. Whenever you cast a red spell, you may untap Cinder Pyromancer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the whole world burns, I'll never grow cold."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barbarians call it "touching the soul of the dragon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The furnace awaits the next master who would stoke the fires of apocalypse.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblin word for "flying" is more accurately translated as "falling slowly."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fortunately, hill giants have large blind spots in which a human can easily hide. Unfortunately, these blind spots are beneath the bottoms of their feet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description." - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) {T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A flash of the lightning, a break of the wave, He passes from life to his rest in the grave." - William Knox, "Mortality"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Pyromancer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vengeance is a dish best served twice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once I saw a goblin shouting at a thunderstorm. He lost the argument pretty quickly." - Wandering mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before armor, there was bark. Before blades, there were thorns." - Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Civic Wayfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Drove of Elves's power and toughness are each equal to the number of green permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The light of beauty protects our journeys through darkness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For what are leaves but countless blades To fight a countless foe on high." - Elvish hymn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Elvish Eulogist: You gain 1 life for each Elf card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how adept our artistic skill, our effigies can never hope to capture the vibrant beauty of a living elf. Perhaps that is truly why we mourn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The faultless and immaculate castes form the lower tiers of elvish society, with the exquisite caste above them. At the pinnacle is the perfect, a consummate blend of aristocrat and predator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before any major undertaking, a Cylian elf seeks the guidance of a visionary to learn the will of the gargantuan ancients.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As graceful as a deer leaping a stream and as deadly as the wolf waiting in ambush on the other side, elvish warriors are the eyes of the forest as well as its unsheathed claws.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gaea sings with the voice of nature rampant: a thousand howls, chitters, and cries, and none of them can be ignored."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murderous horrors of Raven's Run are legendary, but even that haunted place goes quiet when the night wolves howl.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elves of the immaculate class weave flora into living creatures - sometimes to endorse an elite warrior, sometimes to create a breathing work of art.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Elves you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a culture of beauty, the most beautiful are worshipped as gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jagged-Scar Archers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Elves you control. {T}: Jagged-Scar Archers deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the highest tiers of Dawn's Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren's Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Jewels cannot be eaten nor gold drunk. What civilization trades, nature simply provides." - Molimo, maro-sorcerer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to destroy something lifeless, make it live.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like nature, the fern spirals back on itself, eternally seeking its own center.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Green creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bears aren't always as strong and as mean as you imagine. Some are even stronger and meaner.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its spines act like the teeth of a saw, scoring distinctive marks in the vegetation of its territory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only if you've cast another green spell this turn. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Armodons are trained to step on things. Enemy things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left to itself, nature overflows any container, overthrows any restriction, and overreaches any boundary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orcish lumberjacks spent the night sharpening their blades and resting for a day of labor. They awoke to find that the forest had been making its own preparations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A banner for bonds of blood or belief.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

property.name: Rules
property.value: As The Rack enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, The Rack deals X damage to that player, where X is 3 minus the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend." - Onean sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.
